SEARCH
Package com.tangosol.net

Interface DescribableAddressProvider

All Superinterfaces:
AddressProvider, SocketAddressProvider
All Known Implementing Classes:
CompositeAddressProvider, ConfigurableAddressProvider, ConfigurableLocalAddressProvider, RefreshableAddressProvider
public interface DescribableAddressProvider extends AddressProvider
An AddressProvider that additionally allows to retrieve a human readable description of underlying addresses without doing a DNS lookup.
